1.content:
Tails was in his lab working on his latest invention. Well, maybe this one being his latest was a understatement. He had created many new inventions over the last few days. It seemed his brain was coming up with ideas faster then ever. But he had made so many inventions that he didn't have time to test them. He had just finished the machine he was working on. He looked at his inventions and sighed. "How am I ever going to test all of these?" He said.

Suddenly his alarm system went off. "Intruder detected in vault." Said his security system. Tails ran to his vault where he kept his valuables such as rings, and chaos emeralds. When he got there he opened the door to find none other then Rouge. "Rouge? what are you doing here?" He said. "What also would a master thief be doing in a vault?" Said Rouge. "But I can see This was a waste of time. There's nothing in here." Yes the vault was empty. But it was a security feature Tails had made. The vault was designed to teleport what ever was inside it to a empty dimension where no thief could get to it. and it could only be activated by Tails voice.

Then Tails had a Idea. "You came here for the chaos emerald didn't you?" He asked, knowing the answer. "No duh, Sherlock." Said Rouge. "Well, How about we make a deal? I have some inventions I haven't tested yet. If you help me test them, I'll give you the chaos emerald." Rouge thought about it. She decided it was the only way to get the emerald. "All right, I'll do it." She said. She followed Tails to the main part of the lab where he kept his most recent inventions. "What should I test first?" He thought.

152.content: "Okay Rouge just stand here." He pointed to a spot on the floor. Rouge stood there and said. "So what are you gonna try?" "You'll see." Said Tails as he fired the ray and it hit Rouge. In seconds she shrank down the 3 inches. Rouge was shocked as she looked around. everything was bigger then her! Tails picked her up and she stood on his palm. she looked like a toy in his hand. "What did you do to me!?" Rouge yelled. "You said you would test my inventions." Said Tails smiling evily. "Now lets run some tests." He took her to a hamster cage he had and put her inside. Rouge laid on the wood chip covered floor. There was even a water bottle and running wheel. Tails closed the door on the top and put a lock on it. Rouge sat here saying "Do it for the emerald." Then she decided she might as well get some exercise. She got on the wheel and started running. Tails decided he wanted to.....

info.brief_description: Abdl version of Rouge the lab rat
info.description:
Tails makes a deal with Rouge. If she lets him test his inventions on her, He'll give her a chaos emerald.

It’s the Abdl version of this story

Original: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1555051-Rouge-The-Lab-Rat

Don’t be shy to add :)

You can do anything you want as long as you follow these rules.

Rules
1.no vore
2.endings are ok
3. Keep characters in character
4. Have fun
